name: When Life Gives You Lemons
description:
When life gives you lemons, you’d best be prepared to defend yourself. Citrons, those little lemon folks out there, fell from the sky earlier. Their fancy spaceship thingy came crashing down onto my farm. Now, we don’t take too kindly to strangers around here. So grab your gun and get ready.

It’s lemon season.
